sql_lista_daily: SELECT STRING_AGG(fec_backup) AS lista FROM (SELECT FORMAT_DATE("'%Y-%m-%d'", DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE('America/Lima'), INTERVAL Rango Day)) fec_backup FROM UNNEST(GENERATE_ARRAY(0, 4)) AS Rango ORDER BY 1)
sql_reporte_daily: SELECT * FROM (SELECT project_id, dataset_id, table_id, tipo_carga, status, fec_backup, count_table FROM `iter-data-storage-pv.temp.log_backup_tabla` WHERE tipo_carga = 'daily') PIVOT(SUM(count_table) FOR fec_backup IN ({lista}))
sql_lista_weekly: SELECT STRING_AGG(fec_backup) AS lista FROM (SELECT FORMAT_DATE("'%Y-%m-%d'", DATE_TRUNC(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE('America/Lima'), INTERVAL Rango*7 Day), WEEK(MONDAY) )) fec_backup FROM UNNEST(GENERATE_ARRAY(0, 4)) AS Rango ORDER BY 1)
sql_reporte_weekly: SELECT * FROM (SELECT project_id, dataset_id, table_id, tipo_carga, status, fec_backup, count_table FROM `iter-data-storage-pv.temp.log_backup_tabla` WHERE tipo_carga = 'weekly') PIVOT(SUM(count_table) FOR fec_backup IN ({lista}))
sql_lista_monthly: SELECT STRING_AGG(fec_backup) AS lista FROM (SELECT FORMAT_DATE("'%Y-%m-%d'", DATE_SUB(DATE_TRUNC(CURRENT_DATE('America/Lima'), MONTH), INTERVAL Rango Month)) fec_backup FROM UNNEST(GENERATE_ARRAY(0, 4)) AS Rango ORDER BY 1)
sql_reporte_monthly: SELECT * FROM (SELECT project_id, dataset_id, table_id, tipo_carga, status, fec_backup, count_table FROM `iter-data-storage-pv.temp.log_backup_tabla` WHERE tipo_carga = 'monthly') PIVOT(SUM(count_table) FOR fec_backup IN ({lista}))
